header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_font_size=”60px” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Corporate Brand

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|||” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”64px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”40px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”29px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_letter_spacing_tablet=”” text_letter_spacing_phone=”0px” text_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

The Global Metro Chem Group

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”4px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We have been in the chemical business for more than 14 years and assure to deliver the best quality to our customers worldwide. With the strength of 500+ highly skilled professionals, we have a strong workforce to successfully establish our competitive position in the global market of Specialty Minerals Industry & Chemical Industry.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.14.6″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||7px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCG is the parent to its two subsidiaries, The Metro Chem Industries, dominating the Global Market of Speciality Chemicals, Dyes & Intermediates; & GMCI Private Limited., a “master player” in Industrial Minerals Manufacturing.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/GMCG-2.jpg” alt=”GMCG” title_text=”GMCG” align=”center” _builder_version=”4.5.7″ width=”100%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”42px|||||” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”2″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”0px||5px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” module_alignment=”center” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCG’s excellent quality-driven products, creative employees and goal-oriented leadership are its greatest assets. Our passion stretches beyond business, and we aim to build a trustworthy relationship with our esteemed international clients.

Our organization has a designated roadmap for a sustainable future which makes us stand apart in the chemical industry. The impeccable business strategies and contingent planning will boost our growth to expand our business around the globe.

We are forging the future of the mineral industry with our ultra-modern solutions, industry-leading products and impeccable proficiency.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_image=”https://www.gmciltd.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/06/Corporate-Brand-gmci.jpg” custom_padding=”2px||1px|||” collapsed=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ background_color=”rgba(24,127,178,0.31)” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|on||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”38px” text_letter_spacing=”1px” text_line_height=”1.3em” custom_padding=”212px||212px||true|false” global_colors_info=”{}”]

“Supreme quality is a result of innovation coupled with performance.”

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”90%” max_width=”90%” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|700|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”36px” text_letter_spacing=”2px” text_line_height=”1.2em” text_orientation=”center” width=”100%” module_alignment=”left” custom_margin=”||14px||false|false” custom_padding=”||||false|false” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”37px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Quality

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

GMCI takes its quality very sternly. We not only sharpen the quality of our product, but we also concentrate on the manufacturing techniques of the products. To deliver quality is our utmost priority, and we take, all conceivable actions to fulfil the most trustworthy quality of our products.

We understand and determine precise customer requirements and so that we can fulfil their expectation and prove our trustworthiness. Customer satisfaction is one of our core competencies and, we aim, to grow our loyalty and reliability over our customers. Our end-to-end business execution makes our customers want more of our association. Likewise, providing excellent assistance to their requirements in each stage of synergy.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.5.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato||||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_letter_spacing_tablet=”” text_letter_spacing_phone=”0px” text_letter_spacing_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.4em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”left” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

How do you achieve the most excellent quality?

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_5_font=”Lato||||||||” header_5_text_color=”#004b4f” header_5_font_size=”25px” custom_margin=”-17px||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Knowing the answer to this question is very significant. We preserve the quality of the future, quality of life, for our fellow human beings. And most importantly, we are conserving the quality of mother nature.

GMCI’s commitment is to undertake conservative practices and deliver the most high-grade products simultaneously.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px||true|false” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row With the strength of 500+ highly skilled professionals, we have a strong workforce to successfully establish our competitive position in the global market of Specialty Minerals Industry […]
